verse: उत्फुल्लतापिच्छ मनोरम श्रीर्मातुः स्तनन्यस्त मुखारविंदः । उच्छालयन्पादसरोरुहाग्रं, कृष्णः कदा यास्यति दृक्पथं मे ॥
overall_meaning: When will Krishna, with a blooming cloth, charming beauty, the mother's breast adorned, and a face like a lotus, go to the sight of mine, lifting the tip of His lotus feet?
